sn35.19:1.1: “Monks, if you take pleasure in the seer, you take pleasure in suffering.
sn35.19:1.2: If you take pleasure in suffering, I say you’re not exempt from suffering.
sn35.19:1.3: If you take pleasure in the hearer …
sn35.19:1.8: the thinker, you take pleasure in suffering.
sn35.19:1.9: If you take pleasure in suffering, I say you’re not exempt from suffering.
sn35.19:2.1: If you don’t take pleasure in the seer, you don’t take pleasure in suffering.
sn35.19:2.2: If you don’t take pleasure in suffering, I say you’re exempt from suffering.
sn35.19:2.3: If you don’t take pleasure in the hearer …
sn35.19:2.8: the thinker, you don’t take pleasure in suffering.
sn35.19:2.9: If you don’t take pleasure in suffering, I say you’re exempt from suffering.”
